title: Deri Rejects Knesset Offer
body: Shas chairman Aryeh Deri declines Knesset's offer for personal security amid escalating harassment over his support for the Giyus Law, a conscription legislation.

title: Transition Official Under Fire
body: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani's transition team is rocked by vile social media posts from political director Hassaan Chaudhary, who demeaned Jews and praised Iranian extremists.
